title: Scientology Talk at University of Southampton
description:
Representatives from the Church of Scientology in Bournemouth and Poole are coming to give a talk on their side of the popular story. The talk will be about the lives of the ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‹Å“everydayÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ people in the church and how it affects them and will hopefully address many of the questions we have about the church and its place in society.

There will be a question and answer session at the end where the representatives will be happy to answer any questions you may have, donÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t be afraid of asking! We will also hopefully be getting a demo of an E-Meter.
